trait.name: Keen Hearing
text: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Echolocation
text: The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the bat can't bite another target. The bat regains hp equal to the necrotic damage dealt.
